title: Connectivity issues?
body:
Hello everyone,

I've been having issues with my internet connectivity most of the day. It's actually inaccessible at this time. (I am posting this via 4G) I figured I would not be the only one and wanted to make sure others were aware of some potential issues with broadband today.

I am with iiNet and it sounds like they are working on some DNS issues. I'd encourage anyone having issues tonight to go here: http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/ and see if your ISP is having problems. It's a pretty reliable site for Australia internet issues and discussion.

-Riot Cochese

replies.body: Just found this fault from iiNet as well: http://www.iinet.net.au/status/fault.php?id=4158277
